title: Books by Winston Churchill
description:
WINSTON S. CHURCHILL
The books in this torrent were written by Winston S. Churchill. These books do not focus on Churchillâ€™s life and work, nor do they either demonize or defend him as an imperialist, racist, reactionary, revolutionary, statesman, charlatan, etc. Churchill was the embodiment of an era, and as such, displayed the shortcomings, myopia, prejudices, nobility, and grandeur one may find in those times. He was vast, he contained multitudes. Whatever one may think of him, he was a gifted writer and one of the most readable English historians since Gibbon. Love him or loathe him, the best most of us can do is quote him.
My African Journey
The Boer War
The River War and Other Works
History of the English Speaking Peoples: The Birth of Britain; The New World; The Age of Revolution; The Great Democracies
Marlborough: His Life and Times, vols. 1-4
The World Crisis, vols. 1-5 [History of the Great War/First World War]
History of the Second World War: The Gathering Storm; Their Finest Hour; The Grand Alliance; The Hinge of Fate; Closing the Ring; Triumph and Tragedy
